title: The Chimney Sweep and the Miller

sources.title: The Chimney Sweep And The Miller (1900) Directed By Arthur Marvin
sources.description: The Chimney Sweep and the Miller (1900) Director: Arthur Marvin A chimney sweep and a miller become involved in a street fight. The sweep has a bag of soot on his back, and the miller a bag of flour.

metadata.Plot: A chimney sweep and a miller become involved in a street fight. The sweep has a bag of soot on his back, and the miller a bag of flour. The fight causes a lively mixup of black and white, with most amusing effects.
